thread.title: IMPEX Technologies Recognized 2nd Year in a Row on Inc. Magazine’s Fastest-Growing Private Companies List
thread.title_full: IMPEX Technologies Recognized 2nd Year in a Row on Inc. Magazine’s Fastest-Growing Private Companies List

author: admin
title: IMPEX Technologies Recognized 2nd Year in a Row on Inc. Magazine’s Fastest-Growing Private Companies List
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 4:16 PM   IMPEX Technologies 
EL SEGUNDO, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- For a second consecutive year, IMPEX Technologies, a leading-edge technology consulting and services provider, has been named by Inc. magazine on their 34th annual Inc. 5000 list of the nation’s fastest-growing private companies. The Inc. 5000 is widely regarded as the most comprehensive look at America’s entrepreneurial sector. Now in its 34th year, the Inc. 5000 measures the fastest growing privately held companies in an annual ranking. 
Rajiv Shah, President of IMPEX Technologies, commented, “On behalf of our entire team at IMPEX Technologies, I am very honored to be recognized a second year in a row by Inc . Magazine for this exclusive recognition. This achievement is the result of our team’s passion and dedication to provide our clients with exceptional customer service combined with transformative IT solutions. We are very appreciative of all of our customers and the opportunity to meet their diverse and growing business needs.” 
IMPEX Technologies works with a diverse group of clients to strengthen their enterprise organizations’ IT infrastructure by delivering the skills, knowledge and leading-edge solutions in key data center technologies including virtualization, cloud computing, software defined data centers, networking and enterprise data storage with a total commitment to exceptional service experience. 
About the Inc. 5000 The 2015 Inc. 5000 is ranked according to percentage revenue growth when comparing 2011 to 2014. To qualify, companies must have been founded and generating revenue by March 31, 2011. They had to be U.S.-based, privately held, for profit, and independent – not subsidiaries or divisions of other companies, as of December 31, 2014. The minimum revenue required for 2011 is $100,000; the minimum for 2014 is $2 million. 
About IMPEX Technologies IMPEX Technologies is focused on helping enterprise organizations transform their data centers to accommodate changing business requirements and demands for always-accessible information. IMPEX delivers the skills, knowledge and leading-edge solutions in key data center technologies including virtualization, cloud computing, software defined data centers, networking and enterprise data storage with a total commitment to exceptional service experience.
